name: Sillybirdo
greetingText: Mulank 4 walo ki rashi mai aaj sad hona mana hai
wishText: May your code compile without errors and your coffee stay strong! 💻☕️
textInChatBox: Happy birthday, may your life be blah blah blah
text2: I was going to just send a boring birthday text,
text3: But let’s be real, you deserve something more awesome.
text5Content: Dur hai toh kya hua, simping rukni nahi chahiye😘
outroText: Hope this made you smile a little
replayText: if not, keep hitting replay until you do !
